resources.string: Take Q level 1, E or W level 2 (depending on the matchup), then the other at level 3. Then max Q > W > E
Long Range, AOE Crits, AOE Nuke Ult, CC
\nNo Escape, Requires Frontline, Requires Good Positioning
Take Q or W level 1 (depending on the matchup), then the other at level 2, E at level 3. Then max Q > E > W
Long Range, Huge Passive Damage, Escape, Great Laning Phase
\nWeak Mid Game, Ult Can Be Blocked, Weak 1v1 Post 6
Take Q level 1, then W at level 2, E at level 3. Then max Q > W > E or W > Q > E (depending on the matchup)
\nWeak Laning Phase, Short Range, Requires Good Positioning
Take W level 1, Q at level 2, E at level 3. Then max Q > W > E
AA Reset, Team Ult, Spell Shield, Great Laning Phase, Wave Clear
\nShort Range, No Escape, Requires Good Positioning
Take W level 1, Q at level 2, E at level 3. Then max W > Q > E
AA Slow, Huge Stun Ult, Long Range, Great Laning Phase
\nNo Escape, Requires Frontline, Requires Good Positioning
Take Q level 1, W at level 2, E at level 3. Then max Q > W > E
Huge Poke, Long Escape, Strong Mid Game, Great Laning Phase
